resources.string: What type of Tutorial would you like?
To add an event click the red plus sign in the lower left. Click the arrow on the bottom right to continue the tutorial.
Clicking this arrow opens the event button, which allows your create either an event, task, reminder or goal.
Here we will be selecting an event to show what to do when trying to set an event on your calendar.
Set a title for your event, once the title is set click the tick in the bottom right to save the event. Thats the end of the tutorial.
To add a contact, click on the + symbol.
Fill out your desired fields for your contact.
Apply this contact by pressing the save button.
What date would like to see?

To watch a tutorial video, tap these buttons:
